name: Interact Guru
tag_list: email-marketing, email-solutions, email-marketing-services, email-marketer, bulk-email-marketing, business-email-marketing
overview:
Interact Guru is an advanced email product for mass mailing. You can plan, schedule, draft, customize, track and analyze your emails with Interact Guru most easily. This advanced mailer provides you with definitive email marketing services packaged immaculately with top features.

Interact Guru is a premium platform for email communication in a never before equations of quality and price. Send personalized newsletters using custom-designed templates and send it to as many intended recipients as you like, all in a go! It’s all equipped to serve you with advanced definitions of email marketing services. Getting detailed report with email statistics, records & analysis chart to depict trends and tools to interactively deal with the email components, all virtually form a part of this immaculate platform.
